definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The downhill course measured 200m and competitors reached speeds of up to 25km per hour, the organizer said.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 組織者說，參賽選手的最高時速達到了25公里。

sentences.english: Organizers called on supporters to march from there to Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 組織者呼籲支持者從祖科蒂公園遊行至華爾街。

sentences.english: He plays as a midfield play-maker but can also play on the wing.
sentences.chinese: 他可以當中場組織者也可以踢邊路。

sentences.english: This time, Beijing organizers promised a "Green Olympics. ""
sentences.chinese: 這一次，北京的組織者承諾舉辦一次“綠色奧運會”。

sentences.english: This is turning into a huge disaster for FIFA and the South African organisers.
sentences.chinese: 這將給國際足聯和南非的組織者帶來一場巨大的災難。

sentences.english: Convenient cable organizer keeps cables tangle-free.
sentences.chinese: 方便的電纜電線纏結組織者保持免費。

sentences.english: We are funders and shapers—we rely on others to act and implement.
sentences.chinese: 我們是資助者和組織者但我們需要別人的參與執行。

sentences.english: He is organizer of the eight International Congresses on Ericksonian Approaches to Hypnosis and Psychotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 他也是艾瑞克森式催眠與心理治療國際大會的組織者。

sentences.english: Organizers hope to hold the next session in south Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 組織者希望下次會議在南蘇丹召開。

sentences.english: Organizers of the tours, however, say that they satisfy a need.
sentences.chinese: 考察團組織者說，目前的需求是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: Many of our companies need both community managers and community organizers.
sentences.chinese: 我們的許多公司需要社區管理者和社區組織者。

sentences.english: It has been an active organiser of many design-related events.
sentences.chinese: 這是許多與設計相關的事件的一個活躍組織者。

sentences.english: Where do community organizers come from?
He is organizing the meeting in Poland.
sentences.chinese: 他是這次波蘭會議的組織者。

sentences.english: “Paul takes no shit from anybody, ” the organizer of the event recalled.
sentences.chinese: “保羅不會受任何人的氣，”這件事的組織者回憶。

sentences.english: The snacks disappear quickly to the delight of the chef and organizers.
sentences.chinese: 令廚師和組織者高興的是，這些小喫很快售空。

definition: stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
